name: Roundtable Topics Lunch: Zero Knowledge into other domains
description:
The focus of this lunch will be the use of ZK in other domains, such as games, DeFi, social media, and more. Join us to brainstorm some novel ZK use-cases, and learn more about the exciting world of ZK tech.

The lunches will be held in a relaxed and informal setting and are open to individuals of all levels of expertise. They will take place on Mondays, Wednesdays, and Fridays at 21 Bistro, starting at 12 noon. Each lunch will have a unique theme and a set of guiding questions to help drive the discussion. Come and brainstorm some novel zk use-cases with us, and learn more about the exciting world of zk tech.

Lunch will be paid for by Zuzalu/0xPARC. We've reserved space for up to 30 people, first come, first served. If reserved tables are full, you're welcome to join in the conversation but you'll need to pay for your own order.
